snippet.title: Edgard Varese Biography - Edgard Victor Achille Charles Varese Childhood, Life and Timeline
snippet.description: * Edgard Varese Biography - Edgard Victor Achille Charles Varese Childhood, Life and Timeline (clueweb12-0911wb-44-11053) http://www.thefamouspeople.com/profiles/edgard-varese-340.php Edgard Varese Biography - Edgard Victor Achille Charles Varese Childhood, Life and Timeline ...Hyperprism’, ‘Octandre’, and ‘Intégrales’ during this time. In 1927, he became an American citizen. Varese At Paris In 1928, Varese returned to Paris to replace one of the parts in his composition ‘Amériques’ to include the recently constructed instrument, Ondes Martenot. He composed much of his non-electronic pieces during this period and, in 1930, he composed his most famous work ‘Ionisation’. Though it didn’t use any innovation with new instruments, it caught the attention of... [cached version]
